name: AC Installation
description: Professional installation services specifically for your home or office. Our experts ensure proper setup for a cool summer.

name: AC Service
description: Regular servicing effectively maintains optimal performance, extending your unit's lifespan. Keep your AC running smoothly.

name: AC Maintenance
description: Scheduled maintenance prevents breakdowns, ensuring efficient operation year-round. Trust us to keep your AC in top condition.

name: AC Transfer
description: Professional transfer service relocates your air conditioner with care. We handle disassembly, transportation, and reinstallation.

name: AC Rent
description: Temporary rental service for events, construction sites, or temporary accommodations. Stay cool with reliable and affordable solutions.
